workflow.name: Monitor marketing job boards with Bright Data & GPT-4o for growing companies
workflow.description:
This workflow automatically monitors marketing job boards to identify growing companies and potential business opportunities. It saves you time by eliminating the need to manually check job listings and provides insights into which companies are actively hiring and expanding their marketing teams.

## Overview

This workflow automatically scrapes marketing job listings from Indeed and other job boards to extract company information, job details, and growth indicators. It uses Bright Data to access job sites without being blocked and AI to intelligently parse job postings into structured data, then sends formatted email alerts to your marketing team.

## Tools Used

- **n8n**: The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow
- **Bright Data**: For scraping job boards without being blocked
- **OpenAI**: AI agent for intelligent job data extraction and parsing
- **Gmail**: For sending automated job alert emails to your team

## How to Install

1. **Import the Workflow**: Download the .json file and import it into your n8n instance
2. **Configure Bright Data**: Add your Bright Data credentials to the MCP Client node
3. **Set Up OpenAI**: Configure your OpenAI API credentials
4. **Configure Gmail**: Connect your Gmail account for sending notifications
5. **Customize**: Set your target job search parameters and email recipients

## Use Cases

- **Business Development**: Identify rapidly growing companies for potential partnerships
- **Sales Teams**: Target companies actively hiring for sales outreach opportunities
- **Market Research**: Track hiring trends and identify emerging market players
- **Recruitment**: Monitor competitor hiring patterns and market opportunities

## Connect with Me

- **Website**: https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Get Bright Data**: https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

#n8n #automation #jobboards #marketingj jobs #brightdata #webscraping #businessdevelopment #leadgeneration #companyresearch #jobmonitoring #n8nworkflow #workflow #nocode #jobautomation #marketresearch #growingcompanies #hiringtrends #salesleads #prospecting #jobscraping #indeed #recruitmentintel #businessintelligence #marketanalysis #companytracking #automatedalerts #emailnotifications #jobdata #hiringinsights #marketopportunities

nodes.name: üìß Send Job Alerts to Marketing Team

parameters.subject: New marketing job on indeed

parameters.content:
## üü© **SECTION 1: Trigger & Input Setup**

### üîÅ ‚è∞ 1. Schedule Trigger

* **Name:** `‚è∞ Trigger: Check Job Listings`
* **What it does:** Automatically starts the workflow on a fixed schedule (e.g., every morning at 9AM).
* **Why it matters:** No need for manual intervention ‚Äî the job hunt starts automatically while your team sleeps.

### ‚úèÔ∏è üõ†Ô∏è 2. Set Search Parameters

* **Name:** `üõ†Ô∏è Set Search Parameters`
* **What it does:** Manually lets you configure what kind of jobs you want to scrape:

  * Example: `"Marketing"` jobs
  * Location: `"Remote"`
  * Frequency, keyword variations, or filters
* **Why it matters:** This gives you **full control** over what jobs to look for, ensuring you always get relevant alerts.

> ‚úÖ *This section ensures your workflow starts on time and targets the right kind of jobs.*

---

## üü® **SECTION 2: AI Agent with Tools & Memory**

### ü§ñ 3. AI Agent: Scrape & Understand

* **Name:** `ü§ñ AI Agent: Scrape & Understand`
* **What it does:** This is the **brain** of the operation. It receives your input (search parameters) and:

  * Plans the next steps
  * Decides what tools to use
  * Understands how to scrape, parse, and structure data

#### üîó Connected Sub-Nodes:

##### üß† OpenAI Chat Model

* **Name:** `üß† OpenAI: LLM Brain`
* **Purpose:** Provides the reasoning and decision-making for the AI Agent (using ChatGPT-style intelligence).

##### üóÉÔ∏è Simple Memory

* **Name:** `üóÉÔ∏è Agent Memory`
* **Purpose:** Stores historical context and responses so the agent stays consistent and smart across multiple runs.

##### üåê Scrape Indeed (HTML)

* **Name:** `üåê MCP Client to Scrape as HTML`
* **Purpose:** Uses Bright Data's scraping tool to grab job listings directly from Indeed‚Äôs frontend ‚Äî even with protections like anti-bot tech.

##### üßæ Parse Job Listings

* **Name:** `üßæ Structured Output Parser`
* **Purpose:** Takes the messy scraped HTML and turns it into a neat, structured JSON format like:

  ```json
  {
    "title": "Marketing Executive",
    "company": "Avatech Controls",
    ...
  }
  ```

> ü§Ø *This section uses AI + scraping tools to autonomously gather fresh, structured job data without writing a single line of scraping code!*

---

## üü¶ **SECTION 3: Format & Send Email Alerts**

### üßÆ 4. Format Job Data

* **Name:** `üßÆ Format Job Data`
* **What it does:** Uses a **Function Node** to:

  * Flatten and clean the job data
  * Combine details into a neat format
  * Add emojis or Markdown for email readability

Example Output:

```
üì¢ Email Marketing Specialist  
üè¢ Paleovalley | üåç Remote  
üí∞ $70,000 - $80,000 | üïê Full-time  
üéÅ Health insurance, 401(k), Vision  
üìù Build and optimize email flows...
```

### üìß 5. Send Job Alerts to Marketing Team

* **Name:** `üìß Gmail: Send Job Alerts`
* **What it does:** Sends **one beautifully formatted email per job** directly to your marketing team‚Äôs inbox.
* You can customize:

  * Subject line: `üöÄ New Marketing Job Alert`
  * Recipients
  * Styling using HTML/Markdown

> üíå *Your team receives curated, ready-to-review job leads ‚Äî no searching required!*

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# üéØ **AI-Powered Job Scraper Workflow**

*Scrape Remote Marketing Jobs from Indeed & Auto-Email to Your Team*

### ü§ñ 3. AI Agent: Scrape & Understand

## üü¶ **SECTION 3: Format & Send Email Alerts**

Example Output:

```

üè¢ Paleovalley | üåç Remote  
üí∞ $70,000 - $80,000 | üïê Full-time  
üéÅ Health insurance, 401(k), Vision

```

### üìß 5. Send Job Alerts to Marketing Team

* **Name:** `üìß Gmail: Send Job Alerts`
* **What it does:** Sends **one beautifully formatted email per job** directly to your marketing team‚Äôs inbox.
* You can customize:

  * Subject line: `üöÄ New Marketing Job Alert`
  * Recipients

> üíå *Your team receives curated, ready-to-review job leads ‚Äî no searching required!*

---

# ‚úÖ **Why This Workflow is Powerful for Any Beginner**

Even if you're new to automation, this setup helps you:

* üì¨ Automatically deliver handpicked job listings
* ü§ñ Use AI to do the heavy lifting (scraping, parsing, formatting)
* ‚è∞ Save hours every week for you or your team
* üß© Customize every part without code (n8n nodes are visual!)
